titles.title: A resolution designating the first Tuesday in March as "National Public Higher Education Day".
A resolution designating the first Tuesday in March as "National Public Higher Education Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates the first Tuesday in March as National Public Higher Education Day.
Recognizes the importance of public higher education for growing a skilled domestic workforce, promoting research and innovation, and advancing our global competitiveness.
